title.rendered: Spreading Smiles with Reliance Capital – Commercial Finance

content.rendered:
The employees of Reliance Commercial Finance, their children and children from Smile Foundation celebrated Diwali & Children’s Day with an employee engagement activity conducted at Delhi, Mumbai and Chennai. The employees from Reliance were actively involved in this interaction.

The engagement was vibrant with total of 150 kids from Smile Foundation & privileged kids of Reliance employees coming together to celebrate Diwali & Children’s day. Reliance Commercial Finance employees too recollected their childhood by participating in all the fun-frolic activities with the children.

Various activities were lined up to engage the kids & bond their relations with their new friends. They had fun together – planting saplings, making birthday cards, painting pots & diyas, and playing various games. Smile children decorated the diyas to gift to their new found friends. Later they all had delicious lunch together. Last but not the least all the children had big smiles on their little faces when they received beautiful photo frames as their return gifts.
